title: (x) Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith - Albertus {James}
content:
I am totally lost on this one. What's the typeface in the poster for the "Revenge of the Sith" part?   
   
http://photos6.flickr.com/8466279\_b2121a3cc2.jpg   
   
Thanks!
author: bluealgae

comments.content:
The "EPISODE III" part looks to be some form of Garamond.   
   
There's also a freeware font on DaFont's movie section that is "inspired" by the Star Wars poster titling, if you're into the whole poor quality rip-off thing.   
   
 - Lex
